title: Money Habits: How average are you with savings?
intro: Enter your average monthly savings rate (as % of net income). We’ll compare it with the average for your age group.

inputs.name: value
inputs.label: You save …% of your net income each month:

labels.label: Below average
labels.advice: Start small: automate 5% savings and increase each quarter.

labels.label: Around average
labels.advice: Nice job! Try growing toward 15% with clear goals.

labels.label: Above average
labels.advice: Great! Consider a buffer goal and investing part of the excess.

seo.title: Money Habits Test — How average are you with savings?
seo.description: Compare your monthly savings rate with the average for your age group and get tips to improve.
